metadata.title: Daily Sweat - Your Personal AI Workout Planner
metadata.description: Get personalized daily workout plans generated by AI. Track your progress and stay motivated with Daily Sweat.

footer.tagline: Â© {year} Daily Sweat. Sweat Smarter, Not Harder.

workoutGenerator.title: Create Your Workout
workoutGenerator.description: Tell us your preferences, and we'll generate a personalized workout plan for you.
workoutGenerator.muscleGroupsPlaceholder: e.g., Legs, Core, Arms or Full Body

workoutDisplay.title: Your Workout Plan
workoutDisplay.emptyState: Generate a workout plan using the form to see it here.

difficultyFeedback.title: Rate Your Workout
difficultyFeedback.description: Help us improve your next workout by rating the difficulty of this plan.

workoutHistory.title: Workout History
workoutHistory.emptyState: No past workouts found. Complete some workouts to see them here!

restTimer.title: Rest Timer
restTimer.description: Take a breather, then hit it hard!

chatbot.dialogDescription: Ask any fitness or nutrition related questions.
chatbot.initialMessage: Hello! I'm Daily Sweat AI. Ask me anything about fitness, nutrition, or your workouts!
chatbot.errorMessage: Sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later.

toasts.workoutGeneratedDescription: Your new workout plan is ready.
toasts.restOverDescription: Time to get back to it!
toasts.workoutEndedDescription: Come back soon for another session!

errors.invalidAIPlan: Received an invalid workout plan format from AI. Please try again.
errors.emptyAIPlan: The AI generated an empty workout plan. Please try different parameters.
errors.invalidAdjustedAIPlan: Received an invalid adjusted workout plan format from AI. Please try again.
errors.emptyAdjustedAIPlan: The AI adjusted to an empty workout plan. Please try different feedback or generate a new plan.
errors.failedToGenerate: Failed to generate workout. Please try again later.
errors.failedToAdjust: Failed to adjust workout difficulty. Please try again.
errors.cannotStartEmptyWorkout: Cannot start an empty or non-existent workout. Please generate a workout first.
